Open Positions

We regularly hire outstanding candidates for Ph.D. and postdoc positions within the center.

Below is a list of past and current position listings for CA3:

  • November 2023 • Ph.D. students in Data-Driven Storytelling for CA3 closed!
  • August 2023 • Ph.D. students for the Center for Anytime Anywhere Analytics closed!
  • September 2023 • postdoctoral researcher for the Center for Anytime Anywhere Analytics closed!

If you are a prospective student or postdoc, please reach out to Niklas Elmqvist (even if there are no current positions listed).
